    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static Optional<Document> create(Path path,
                                        String content,
                                        Language language,
                                        Charset encoding,
                                        String mimeType,
                                        Map<String,String> metadata,
                                        FileParser.Type parserType)
        Instantiate a new Document from given path which must point to regular, existing, readable file
        Parameters:
        path - the file path from which to createList document
        content - the text content
        language - the detected content language
        metadata - the rest of extracted metadata
        mimeType - the detected mime type
        Returns:
        an Optional of Document if instantiation succeeded; empty Optional otherwise

      • create

        public static Optional<Document> create(Path path,
                                        FileParser parser)
        Instantiate a new Document from given parser and path
        Parameters:
        path - the file path from which to createList document
        parser - the used parser
        Returns:
        an Optional of immutable Document if instantiation succeeded; empty Optional otherwise
